name: Oasis For Girls
description: Oasis For Girls partners with young women of color from under-resourced communities in San Francisco to help them cultivate the skills, knowledge, and confidence to discover their dreams and build strong futures. Oasis' programming is modeled on youth development research illustrating young women can explore diverse areas of interest, stay engaged with academic and career opportunities, and better achieve their goals when they are involved in multifaceted programming in a girl-focused setting gu
